content: The best part? Just keep reeling them in and letting them go, bhan-bhan!
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1008热贝尔_单一闲聊

content:
Most of the time,
I keep my antenna up—my tail, that is—
sensing if there are any treasures around!
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1008热贝尔_单一闲聊

content:
When I first got off,
someone praised the scenery here,
indeed, {短暂停}"beautiful mountains and clear waters, and absolutely nothing else."
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1008热贝尔_单一闲聊

content:
Rather than believing in some vague destiny,
I believe we can break through anything!
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1008热贝尔_单一闲聊

content:
I don't believe it,
Because I'll never give in, Bhan-bhan!
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1008热贝尔_单一闲聊

content: [Custom Topic D Bond Level 4-1]

content: [Custom Topic D Bond Level 4-2]
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1008热贝尔_单一闲聊

content: [Custom Topic E Bond Level 4-2]
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1008热贝尔_单一闲聊

content:
I love the scenery of our island!
The wild winds are perfect for running around and shouting:
"WHO DARES TO CHALLENGE ME!"
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1008热贝尔_单一闲聊

content: [Custom Topic E Bond Level 4-1]
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1008热贝尔_单一闲聊

content:
What do I do in my free time...
Actually, I'm free all day,
I can do whatever I want.
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1008热贝尔_单一闲聊
闲聊-定制话题1-1008热贝尔_单一闲聊

content: [Custom Topic E Bond Level 4-3]
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1008热贝尔_单一闲聊

content:
You don't really think I only mine during my free time, do you?
No way! I also... {短暂停}um...
Right! Fishing!
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1008热贝尔_单一闲聊
闲聊-定制话题1-1008热贝尔_单一闲聊

content:
When I'm bored,
I sometimes sit on the mountaintop... playing games.
Have you heard of "Golden Miner Cat"?
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1008热贝尔_单一闲聊

content:
But strangely enough,
now even when I go out to have fun,
I find myself looking for ways to come back.
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1008热贝尔_单一闲聊

content:
When misfortune strikes,
Those folks whisper in my ear,
"Some things are just meant to be..."
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1008热贝尔_单一闲聊

content:
The mantra "all things are preordained"
Hangs like a sword above my head,
Its cold blade gleaming, waiting for me to give up.
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1008热贝尔_单一闲聊

content:
But if even I give up,
who else will search
for those who've gone missing...
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1008热贝尔_单一闲聊

content:
People say I'm rebellious,
If I'm told not to do something, that's exactly what I'll do.
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1008热贝尔_单一闲聊

content:
But I just want to oppose "prohibition,"
No one's life
Should be suppressed or constrained.
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1008热贝尔_单一闲聊

content:
Not even a single squirrel around...
Don't tell me someone ate them?!
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1008热贝尔_单一闲聊

content:
I usually can't stay in one place for too long,
I always get the urge to run off somewhere,
and I'm feeling that way right now too.
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1008热贝尔_单一闲聊
